'''1.20.14''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on August 8, 2023, which fixes a crash that occurs in PlayStation.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/18301047429901|title=Minecraft - 1.20.14 (PlayStation Only)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 8, 2023}}</ref>

== Fixes == 
'''2 issues fixed'''
* Fixed a top crash that could occur during gameplay
* Fixed an issue on PlayStation causing players to lose access to the Store
